summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeLanolips 12 Hour Overnight Lip Mask is a deeply replenishing overnight lip mask with lanolin plus actives vitamin C, hyaluronic acid & ceramides. Extra rich & buttery. Guaranteed to stay on all night.
details: DetailsBenefitsYour bedtime routine just got better with our new 12 Hour Overnight Lip Mask.It‚Äôs guaranteed to stay on all-night and it‚Äôs the butteriest balm of them all.Let the actives Vit C, ceramides and hyaluronic acid work their magic overnight and wake up to pillowy soft lips!FeaturesFemale-Owned Beauty BrandCruelty-FreeCertified by Leaping Bunny100% NaturalFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsFragrancesPthalatesPetrolatumMineral OilItem 2612757How To UseApply to lips before bedPrecautions: For external use onlyIngredientsLanolin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Vanillin, Beeswax, Honey, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol (Vit E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vit C), Sodium Hyaluronate (HLA), Aqua (Water), Ceramide 3. Naturally Derived.
how_to_use: Apply to lips before bedPrecautions: For external use only

reviews.headline: I fully recommend this
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm it's so so moisturising and hydrating I recommend

reviews.headline: i love this, one if my favorites
reviews.comments: just tried this and its one of my favorite lanolips

reviews.headline: Gold Star For My Lips
reviews.comments: Pleasantly surprised how well this product has worked for me. I've been using it every night for two weeks and my lips have not peeled once! Normally my lips would peel every few days. Lanolips Overnight Lip Mask keeps my lips moisturized even throughout the next day! Very impressed and it smells great :-)

reviews.headline: The last lip nask you will ever need!
reviews.comments: This product was new to me but the sale price pulled me in. I bought three different products. This overnight mask is simply perfection!! It doesn't wear off overnight, doesn't clump up, it stays all night and deeply moisturizes. Smells like yummy vanilla which I love!

reviews.headline: Not as good as other products by this Company
reviews.comments: I have not found this product to meet my expectations!  The Lanollips lip scrub coco nutter is a much better product for my lips but that one wasn't available at the sale!!!

reviews.headline: Gave me a reaction
reviews.comments: I ended up with burning sores all around my  mouth. Not so much on my lips, but on the skin surrounding. Parts of it kept weeping throughout the week .These photos were taken about a week after using it. Now it's been a week and a half, and I'm still not fully healed.

reviews.headline: Oh the burning...
reviews.comments: I don't know what I reacted to in this product, but it burned my lips. I wiped it off immediately, but my lips are still fried from that one minute I left it on. I have other Lanolips products that work fine - maybe it's the vitamin C? I would have returned it, but I hate to be wasteful and this actually makes a nice cuticle balm, so I give it 3 stars since I could repurpose it. Your mileage may vary, of course.

reviews.headline: Love love love!
reviews.comments: Love this line of skin care and use the regular cream for my lips every night without fail. Then this was on offer and I wanted to try it out - love it it's so soft with a lovely hint of scent to it and I still have smooth soft lips in the morning. Definitely recommend this range and this one doesn't disappoint

reviews.headline: So little product!
reviews.comments: I like the product itself- but it's wild how little product there is. I have used it twice and it's only half full! I know it says .52 oz, but I feel the packaging is misleading. Much larger tube than necessary for the amount of product provided. I won't re-purchase based off of the price vs. size.

reviews.headline: Great Sleeping Mask
reviews.comments: My lips always feel moisturized after using this!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love this one! Super hydrating and worth the splurge.

reviews.headline: i love this product
reviews.comments: i havent had it for long but i have been using lanolips for a while and just gave this one a shot and i am glad i did i have bought so many scents and not fell in love with the scents but love the hydration from the product so i continued to buy it but ive found my new favorite smells just honey and a hint of vanilla so good üëçüèΩ

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I am obsessed with the LANO Lanolips Overnight Lip Mask! The formula is so soothing and nourishing on the lips. This feels so comfortable on the lips and is ultra moisturizing as well as healing. It has a beautiful glossy finish too.

reviews.headline: Made my lips look fuller and plump üíãüíØ
reviews.comments: My lips always feel fresh, softer and plump the next day üíØ‚ú®

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I'm super picky about lip balms and this is my absolute holy grail. I wear it day and night. Has the most amazing marshmallow vanilla scent.

reviews.headline: I love!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lip mask! It's definitely one of my favorites and I truly think it's underrated. It hydrates my lips amazingly and I would highly highly recommend this lip mask!!!!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments:
Worked wonders for my lips! Highly recommend. 
And love the packing, it's the cutest.

reviews.headline: Absolutely working magic on my lips
reviews.comments: I highly recommend it. I daily wear lipstick and at times my lips are dry after make up removing and lip oil doesn't really nourish my lips overnight. It just "covers" the moisture loss. So I need a product that deeply nourishes my lips during my sleep. And this is the answer to my need. It will be my staple vanity.

reviews.headline: leave lips moisturized in the morning.
reviews.comments: leave lips moisturized in the morning. has good staying power throughout the night. kinda stings lips though.

reviews.headline: Lanolips eats
reviews.comments: This eats! Best lip product ever.

media.headline: It's good but could be better
It's good but could be better

faceoff_positive.comments: I typically do not do reviews.  I'm not easily "wowed".  I bought this on a whim after an only recommendation.  I use it every night alone, then during the day under the Lanolips tinted balm.  I have a medical condition that leaves my lips not just dry, but they peel and crack until they bleed.  It is very painful and I have tried everything to no avail.  For the last couple of years, I had been using Clinique moisture surge- but this is so much better!  I was in a pretty bad state- my lips hurt so darn bad.  I was nervous of trying this since it is lanolin and I am allergic to wool.  Surprisingly, I did not have a reaction.  Within days, the peeling, flaking, everything was gone!  I mean, I have had issues for years and this just magically healed everything!  I can't believe my lips are soft, nourished, and feel good! My husband was so impressed, he started using the 12 hour balm too- he has psoriasis and uses this everywhere- lips, elbows, wherever.  It is a miracle ointment in a tube.  It does not have a lip applicator, but I don't really mind since I am using this for multi-purpose.  This is a "can't live without" product for sure!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally, something that works!

faceoff_negative.comments: The scent reminds me a bit of carmex but at least the product does not contain menthol. From the first application I noticed a tingling sensation which I dismissed at first thinking it was possibly just transfer from a different product I dipped my finger into. After  applying it a second time I noticed it again and went to the Lano site to see if it is mentioned at all. The tingling can be caused by the vitamin C although I was not aware of that being an affect because it is not stated on the product or Ulta site at all. I would say the tingling for me at least lasts about 15 minutes so if you don't mind it's still a good product. In terms of performance it's alright if Im being honest I would say less is more and will just stick to my usual Lanolips ointment 101 tube (which is pure lanolin) in comparison to this product that has other ingredients listed. I will wait out and see if its any better as it has only been a day since I used it but for first impressions im not impressed.
faceoff_negative.headline: Reminds me of carmex
